item.title: Who Is a Data Visualization Engineer?
item.description: To answer simply, Data Visualization Engineer is someone who knows how to present data and story tell to drive the point home. Let’s discuss what skills one should have to enjoy being in this role: When you look at data especially messy data, your eyes should lit up and your fingers should start working already to clean and process data at hand. When someone explains a problem, you kick start the process by doing research.
